summary: A group of hotheaded street racers are on their way to the Road Rally 1000. As they drive through a desolate shortcut on the way to the race, a man starts tracking, teasing and torturing them until the end of the road.
cast: Ken Kirzinger|Jesse Hutch|Benjamin Hollingsworth|Gianpaolo Venuta|Jake Manley|Kirsten Zien|Leela Savasta|Sara Mitich|J. Adam Brown|James Durham|Dean Armstrong|Aaron Hughes|David Ferry|Scott Johnson|Rick Skene|Kyle Nobess|Heather Hueging|Brian Clark|Kristen Sawatzky|Ronald Lussier
title: Nunca juegues con extra√±os 3
